short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display the webcam in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Quick Mirror 🪞, the Chrome extension that lets you check your appearance in a snap! With just a click, you can take a quick peek at yourself 👀 and make sure you're looking your best 💁‍♀️💁‍♂️.
